title: Privacy Policy Overview
content: Our privacy policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information. We are committed to maintaining the confidentiality and security of your data in accordance with applicable privacy laws.

title: Terms of Service
content: By using our services, you agree to our terms of service which outline your rights and responsibilities, our service limitations, and the legal framework governing our relationship.

title: Data Protection and GDPR Compliance
content: We comply with GDPR and other data protection regulations. You have the right to access, correct, delete, or export your personal data. Contact our privacy team for data-related requests.

title: Intellectual Property Rights
content: All content, trademarks, and intellectual property on our platform are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

title: User Content and Licensing
content: By submitting content to our platform, you grant us a non-exclusive license to use, display, and distribute your content as necessary to provide our services.

title: Service Availability and Uptime
content: While we strive for maximum uptime, we cannot guarantee uninterrupted service. Our Service Level Agreement outlines our uptime commitments and compensation for outages.

title: Account Termination Policy
content: We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate our terms of service, engage in harmful activities, or remain inactive for extended periods. Users will receive appropriate notice before termination.

title: Limitation of Liability
content: Our liability is limited as outlined in our terms of service. We are not responsible for indirect damages, data loss, or business interruption except as required by law.

title: Dispute Resolution and Arbitration
content: Disputes will be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with our terms. Users waive the right to jury trials and class action lawsuits except where prohibited by law.

title: Cookie Policy and Tracking
content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience, analyze usage patterns, and provide personalized content. Users can manage cookie preferences in their browser settings.

title: Third-Party Integrations and Liability
content: Our platform may integrate with third-party services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices, security, or content of external services.

title: Age Restrictions and Parental Consent
content: Our services are intended for users 13 years and older. Users under 18 require parental consent. We comply with COPPA and other child protection regulations.

title: International Data Transfers
content: Your data may be processed in countries outside your residence. We ensure adequate protection through standard contractual clauses and other approved transfer mechanisms.

title: Security Measures and Data Breaches
content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data. In case of a data breach, we will notify affected users and regulatory authorities as required by law.

title: API Terms and Rate Limiting
content: API usage is subject to rate limits and fair use policies. Commercial use of our API requires a separate agreement. Abuse of API services may result in access suspension.

title: Refund and Cancellation Policy
content: Refunds are processed according to our cancellation policy. Premium subscriptions can be cancelled anytime with refunds prorated to the unused service period.

title: Service Modifications and Updates
content: We reserve the right to modify, update, or discontinue features of our service. Users will be notified of significant changes that may affect their use of the platform.

title: User Responsibilities and Acceptable Use
content: Users are responsible for maintaining account security, using the service lawfully, and not engaging in harmful activities such as spamming, hacking, or harassment.

title: Content Moderation and Removal
content: We reserve the right to moderate, remove, or restrict access to content that violates our community guidelines, terms of service, or applicable laws.

title: Billing and Payment Terms
content: Subscription fees are billed in advance. Failed payments may result in service suspension. We accept major credit cards and other approved payment methods.

title: Beta Features and Experimental Services
content: Beta features are provided as-is without warranties. We may discontinue or modify beta features at any time. Feedback on experimental services is appreciated.

title: Accessibility Compliance
content: We strive to make our services accessible to users with disabilities in compliance with WCAG guidelines. Contact us for accessibility assistance or to report issues.

title: Export Controls and International Use
content: Our services may be subject to export control laws. Users are responsible for compliance with applicable laws when accessing our services from different countries.

title: Force Majeure and Service Interruptions
content: We are not liable for service interruptions due to circumstances beyond our control, including natural disasters, government actions, or technical failures of third-party providers.

title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
content: These terms are governed by the laws of the jurisdiction where our company is incorporated. Legal disputes will be resolved in the courts of that jurisdiction.
